narratives.narrative_name: CC: Questioning the measurements and science
narratives.evidence_quote: यह आंकड़ा भी शायद कम आंका गया है.
narratives.reasoning: The statement questions the accuracy of reported dengue case numbers and implies undercounting and measurement gaps, fitting the narrative of doubting measurements and scientific data.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: CC: Questioning the measurements and science: Methodologies/metrics used are unreliable/faulty
subnarratives.evidence_quote: पिछले दो दशकों में, डेंगू के रिपोर्ट किए गए मामलों में दस गुना वृद्धि हुई है. यह आंकड़ा भी शायद कम आंका गया है.
subnarratives.reasoning: The Lancet editorial citation highlights that reported dengue numbers may be undercounted, suggesting the data/metrics used to track dengue are unreliable. Additionally, statements that countries may not report data or test every patient reinforce concerns about measurement reliability.
